summary: Frontend testing completed for ImageWithSkeleton component (shimmer effect for listing images). All 5 features verified as working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ImageWithSkeleton component correctly implements shimmer loading pattern with CSS animation for web and Animated API for native
CSS @keyframes shimmer properly defined in +html.tsx with 1.5s infinite ease-in-out animation
[data-shimmer='true'] selector applies linear-gradient background (E0E0E0 -> F5F5F5 -> E0E0E0) with 200% background-size for smooth animation
Component uses dataSet prop for web platform to apply data-shimmer attribute for CSS styling
Placeholder icon (Ionicons image-outline) correctly displays for listings without images
Image opacity transitions from 0 (while loading) to 1 (after loaded) to prevent layout shifts
context_for_next_testing_agent: ImageWithSkeleton shimmer effect tested and working. Shimmer visible during page load, images display correctly after loading, placeholder icons work for missing images. CSS animation defined in /app/frontend/app/+html.tsx lines 124-138.

shimmer_skeleton_appears_during_load.details: Shimmer skeleton visible during page load - captured in first screenshot showing 8 skeleton cards with gradient animation

images_display_after_loading.details: 18 images loaded correctly - Tesla, Apartment, Smart TV, laptop, etc. all display with proper aspect ratio

placeholder_icon_for_missing_images.details: Placeholder icon (image-outline) visible for 'Third User Listing d8de0700' and 2x 'MacBook Pro for Sale' listings without images

no_layout_shifts.details: Card dimensions remain consistent during load - skeleton and final state have same dimensions

shimmer_animation_smooth.details: @keyframes shimmer with 1.5s infinite ease-in-out animation, linear-gradient with 200% background-size creates smooth left-to-right shimmer effect

implementation_verification.component_integration: ListingCard in index.tsx (lines 319-330) uses ImageWithSkeleton replacing old Image + placeholder logic
implementation_verification.native_shimmer: ShimmerOverlay component uses Animated API with translateX interpolation for native platforms
